data.title: Lindab divests Slovakian operations to local Investors Corporate Commercial Mergers and Acquisitions
KPMG divests its business regarding audit, advisory and tax services to smaller companies
M&G acquires a majority stake in P Capital Partners

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: What truly distinguishes Mannheimer Swartling in the Swedish legal market is the way we have built our full-service practice. We have specialist lawyers for all branches of business law, working in dedicated practice groups. All these groups are typically class-leading and they handle their own specialist projects independently – working at the forefront of their respective fields – as well as providing the highest level of transactional support. This combination gives us the ability to quickly mobilise a single team of experts with the best skillset for every facet of every engagement.

employees.title: Our People
employees.description: Who are you looking for? Although we are spread across a global market, we are a close-knit team with expertise in all areas of business law.

hero2.title: International
hero2.description: Fortis Noble is a leading international law firm with a strong focus on the Nordic region. We are a full-service law firm with a strong focus on the Nordic region.
